item.text: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers and sisters, because you know that we will be judged more strictly.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> we <st data-num="537" class="">all</st> <st data-num="4417" class="">stumble</st><n id="1" /> in <st data-num="4183">many ways</st>. <st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4417" class="">stumble</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> what he <st data-num="3056" class="">says</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">he</st> is a <st data-num="5046" class="">perfect</st> <st data-num="435" class="">individual</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="1415" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="5468" class="">control</st> the <st data-num="3650" class="">entire</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> <st data-num="2532">as well</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> we <st data-num="906" class="">put</st> <st data-num="5469" class="">bits</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="4750" class="">mouths</st> of <st data-num="2462" class="">horses</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> get <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> to <st data-num="3982" class="">obey</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">then</st> we <st data-num="3329" class="">guide</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3650" class="">entire</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">bodies</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2400" class="">Look at</st> <st data-num="4143" class="">ships</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too:</st> Though they <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="5082" class="">so large</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1643" class="">driven</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4642" class="">harsh</st> <st data-num="417" class="">winds</st>, they are <st data-num="3329" class="">steered</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> a <st data-num="1646" class="">tiny</st> <st data-num="4079" class="">rudder</st> <st data-num="3699" class="">wherever</st> the <st data-num="2116" class="">pilot’s</st> <st data-num="3730">inclination</st> <st data-num="1014">directs</st>.

<st data-num="3779" class="">So</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st>, the <st data-num="1100" class="">tongue</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="3398" class="">small</st> <st data-num="3196">part of the body</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">yet</st> it <st data-num="3166" class="">has</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="3166" class="">pretensions</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2400" class="">Think</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2245" class="">how small</st> a <st data-num="4442" class="">flame</st> <st data-num="381" class="">sets</st> a <st data-num="2245" class="">huge</st> <st data-num="5208" class="">forest</st> <st data-num="381" class="">ablaze</st>.

And the tongue is a fire! The tongue represents the world of wrongdoing among the parts of our bodies. It pollutes the entire body and sets fire to the course of human existence—and is set on fire by hell.
For every kind of animal, bird, reptile, and sea creature is subdued and has been subdued by humankind.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">no</st> <st data-num="444">human being</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="1150" class="">subdue</st> the <st data-num="1100" class="">tongue;</st> it is a <st data-num="182" class="">restless</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2556" class="">evil</st>, <st data-num="3324" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="2287" class="">deadly</st> <st data-num="2447" class="">poison</st>.

<st data-num="1722" class="">With</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> we <st data-num="2127" class="">bless</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> we <st data-num="2672" class="">curse</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1096" class="">made</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="3669" class="">image</st>.

<st data-num="1537" class="">From</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">same</st> <st data-num="4750" class="">mouth</st> <st data-num="1831" class="">come</st> <st data-num="2129" class="">blessing</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2671" class="">cursing</st>. <st data-num="3778">These things</st> <st data-num="5534" class="">should</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st>.<n id="1" />

A <st data-num="4077" class="">spring</st> does <st data-num="3385" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1032" class="">pour out</st> <st data-num="1099">fresh water</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4089" class="">bitter water</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">same</st> <st data-num="3692" class="">opening</st>, does it?
Can a fig tree produce olives, my brothers and sisters, or a vine produce figs? Neither can a salt water spring produce fresh water.
Who is wise and understanding among you? By his good conduct he should show his works done in the gentleness that wisdom brings.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="4089" class="">bitter</st> <st data-num="2205" class="">jealousy</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2052" class="">selfishness</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st>, do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2620" class="">boast</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5574">tell lies</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>.

<st data-num="3778" class="">Such</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2718" class="">come</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="509" class="">from above</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> is <st data-num="1919" class="">earthly</st>, <st data-num="5591" class="">natural</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1141" class="">demonic</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> is <st data-num="2205" class="">jealousy</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2052" class="">selfishness</st>, <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> is <st data-num="181" class="">disorder</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="5337" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="4229" class="">practice</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st> <st data-num="509">from above</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="4413">first</st> <st data-num="53" class="">pure</st>, <st data-num="1899" class="">then</st> <st data-num="1516" class="">peaceable</st>, <st data-num="1933" class="">gentle</st>, <st data-num="2138" class="">accommodating</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3324" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="1656" class="">mercy</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="2590" class="">fruit</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="87" class="">impartial</st>, and <st data-num="505">not hypocritical</st>.<n id="3" />
And the fruit that consists of righteousness is planted in peace among those who make peace.
